channel.title: Rust on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku

item.title: Perl Weekly Challenge - Guest Contributions
item.description: As you know, “Perl Weekly Challenge”, primarily focus on Perl and Raku. During the Week #018, we received the solution to “Perl Weekly Challenge - 018” by Orestis Zekai in Python. It was a pleasant surprise to receive solution in something other than Perl and Raku. Ever since regular team members also started contributing in other languages like C++, Go, Haskell, Javascript, Postscript, Prolog, R, Rust and HTML. Please find below guest contributions.

item.title: [ Perl | Raku | The ] Weekly Challenge - 2020
item.description: It has been wonderful journey so far in the year 2019. When I started the journey in March, I didn’t know it would take this shape. All credit goes to the support of Perl/Raku community in general. It would be unfair if I pick few names. You know who I am talking about anyway. Let me share the story with you all. I was working on 2 ideas at the start of the year 2019, “Perl Weekly Challenge” and “London Hack Day”.
